Package mediator

Class RmiServer

java.lang.Object
mediator.RmiServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.rmi.Remote, java.util.EventListener, RemoteModel, utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>, utility.observer.subject.RemoteSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>
public class RmiServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements RemoteModel, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
An RMI server makes remote objects accessible to clients by registering them in the registry; clients then obtain access via that same registry.
Version:
1.0.0 2021
Author:
Group8-SEP2

    One-argument constructor.

  • Constructor Details

    • RmiServer

      public RmiServer​(Model model)
      One-argument constructor. It registers the stub on the registry.
      Parameters:
      model - the Model object to which some methods are delegated.

  • Method Details

    • startRegistry

      public static void startRegistry() throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      This method starts a registry on the port 1099
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - If there are any connection issues

    • addOffer

      public java.lang.String addOffer​(Offer offer) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      The method delegates to the model to add the Offer to the list, then checks the result of the action and returns a string that contains it.
      Specified by:
      addOffer in interface RemoteModel
      Parameters:
      offer - Offer to be added to the server.
      Returns:
      It returns a String that confirms if the offer has been added or not.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - if there are issues during the connection.

    • login

      public User login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      The method delegates the model to get the user corresponding to the credentials given in the arguments if they are correct.
      Specified by:
      login in interface RemoteModel
      Parameters:
      username - Username for the login.
      password - Password for the login.
      Returns:
      It returns the object of the requested user if the credentials are correct, if not the object can be null.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - if there are issues during the connection.

    • signUp

      public boolean signUp​(User user) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      The method delegates the model to add and register the account provided in the argument.
      Specified by:
      signUp in interface RemoteModel
      Parameters:
      user - The user object sent to the server to be stored and registered.
      Returns:
      False, if an user with the same username already exists, true if not.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - if there are issues during the connection.

    • getUsersOnline

      public OnlineUserList getUsersOnline() throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      The method delegates the model to get the OnlineUserList object stored in it.
      Specified by:
      getUsersOnline in interface RemoteModel
      Returns:
      An OnlineUserList object containing the users online registered by the server.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - if there are issues during the connection.

    • getOffers

      public OfferList getOffers() throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      The method delegates the model to get the OfferList object stored in it.
      Specified by:
      getOffers in interface RemoteModel
      Returns:
      An OfferList object containing the offers available registered in the server.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - If there are any connection issues.

    • sendMessage

      public java.lang.String sendMessage​(User sender, java.lang.String receiver, java.lang.String body) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      The method delegates the model to send a message to the specified user.
      Specified by:
      sendMessage in interface RemoteModel
      Parameters:
      sender - User object of the sender of the message.
      receiver - String containing the username of the user who is supposed to receive to message.
      body - String object containing the body of the message sent.
      Returns:
      A String containing the result of the action telling if it ended successfully or if it faced any errors.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - if there are issues during the connection.

    • sendRequest

      public void sendRequest​(java.lang.String offerer, Offer offer) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      The method delegates the model to send a request to the landlord for a property.
      Specified by:
      sendRequest in interface RemoteModel
      Parameters:
      offerer - A String object of the username of the user who is making the offer for the landlord.
      offer - The Offer object of the offer interested.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - if there are issues during the connection.

    • getRentingList

      public RentingList getRentingList​(java.lang.String username) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      The method delegates the model to get the RentingList object with the renting deals objects related to the user passed in the argument.
      Specified by:
      getRentingList in interface RemoteModel
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user who is requiring its list of renting deals.
      Returns:
      the RentingList object stored in the server.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - if there are issues during the connection.

    • publishFeedback

      public void publishFeedback​(java.lang.String role, java.lang.String feedback, Renting renting) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      The method delegates the model to publish a feedback in the Renting object.
      Specified by:
      publishFeedback in interface RemoteModel
      Parameters:
      role - The role of the user who is publishing the feedback.
      feedback - The text of the feedback.
      renting - The Renting object where the feedback will be published.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - if there are issues during the connection.

    • acceptRequest

      public void acceptRequest​(java.lang.String usernameOfOfferer, Offer offer)
      The method delegates the model to accept a request from a tenant for a property.
      Specified by:
      acceptRequest in interface RemoteModel
      Parameters:
      usernameOfOfferer - The username of the user who sent the request
      offer - The Offer object for which the request was sent.

    • refuseRequest

      public void refuseRequest​(Offer offer) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      The method delegates the model to refuse a request from a tenant for a property.
      Specified by:
      refuseRequest in interface RemoteModel
      Parameters:
      offer - The Offer object of the offer where the request was sent
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - if there are issues during the connection.

    • applyFilters

      public java.util.ArrayList<Offer> applyFilters​(double minPrice, double maxPrice, int noOfRooms, java.lang.String type, int floor, double deposit)
      The method delegates the model to obtain an OfferList object of the offers which respect the conditions.
      Specified by:
      applyFilters in interface RemoteModel
      Parameters:
      minPrice - The minimum price for filter search.
      maxPrice - The maximum price for filter search.
      noOfRooms - The number of rooms in a Offer for filter search.
      type - The type of Offer for filter search.
      floor - The floor from Offer for filter search.
      deposit - The deposit from Offer for filter search.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList with filtered offers stored in the database.

    • addListener

      public boolean addListener​(utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> listener, java.lang.String... propertyNames) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Method to add a listener to the PropertyChangeHandler object.
      Specified by:
      addListener in interface utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>
      Specified by:
      addListener in interface utility.observer.subject.RemoteSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>
      Parameters:
      propertyNames - String containing the name of the property the listener will listen to.
      listener - GeneralListener object which represents the listener to the property.
      Returns:
      true if the listener has been added. It is optional if this return true if the listener has been added to at least one of the property names or if it successfully has been added to all listed
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - when something goes wrong e.g. in connection, sending or receiving

    • removeListener

      public boolean removeListener​(utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> listener, java.lang.String... propertyNames) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Method to remove a listener to the PropertyChangeHandler object.
      Specified by:
      removeListener in interface utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>
      Specified by:
      removeListener in interface utility.observer.subject.RemoteSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>
      Parameters:
      propertyNames - String containing the name of the property the listener will stop to listen to.
      listener - GeneralListener object which represents the listener to the property.
      Returns:
      true if the listener has been removed. It is optional if this return true if the listener has been removed from at least one of the property names or if it successfully has been removed from all listed
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - when something goes wrong e.g. in connection, sending or receiving

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange​(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Method called whenever a change in the properties of the model happens, because the RmiServer is its listener.
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - ObserverEvent object which contains details about the event.
